title: OCE gotta be the worst server ever
body: So in a WINNING game you have people that just afk in the middle of the game then proceeds to go fountain (not even dc) for the rest of the game and then you proceeds to lose the game 4v5 + you have people that does not connect from the first miniute then reconnects like 30+ mins into the game WTF is wrong with this server

replies.body: And I can tell you that OCE has had issues like that ALL THE TIME when I  was on NA I don't experience as much this type of issue

> [{quoted}](name=Kwang is God,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZrPvUBnY,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-28T06:39:15.749+0000)
>
> And I can tell you that OCE has had issues like that ALL THE TIME when I  was on NA I don't experience as much this type of issue

%%%% off back to NA then.

-saying oce is worst server
-hasn't even experienced other servers


great argument lel 
{{champion:79}} {{champion:79}}

These are the wrong reasons for saying OCE is the worst.

Personally for me its the attitude of players who need to self validate their ability to play a computer game.
I mute these people and enjoy the rest of the game :)

yeah oce is the only server who has afk's and internet problems........
in fact just get rid of it so we can go back to na where we get 200+ ping every game
